heading: HR01361
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO ASSESS THE BUDGET PROVIDED TO THE NATIONAL COMMISSION ON MUSLIM FILIPINOS AND ITS SEVEN (7) BUREAUS FOR THE YEARS 2010-2017 IN COMPARISON TO THEIR PERFORMANCE FOR THE BENEFIT OF MUSLIM FILIPINOS FOR THE YEARS 2010 TO 2017
status: Pending with the Committee on MUSLIM AFFAIRS since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01361
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO ASSESS THE BUDGET PROVIDED TO THE NATIONAL COMMISSION ON MUSLIM FILIPINOS AND ITS SEVEN (7) BUREAUS FOR THE YEARS 2010-2017 IN COMPARISON TO THEIR PERFORMANCE FOR THE BENEFIT OF MUSLIM FILIPINOS FOR THE YEARS 2010 TO 2017
